item.title: Destination Marketing Tips and Tricks from tourism experts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Learn More About Tourism Marketing. We Bring You Destination Marketing Tips and Tricks

Tourism is one of the largest and fastest growing industries in the world, which is why sustainable tourism is so important. It helps to conserve cultural heritage and preserve nature in the same time. Every destination has it’s own unique story and practicing sustainable tourism, you give that unique story much more important place in marketing, destination planning and assessment and of course you have long term benefits. As the number of tourists rises each year, it is of vital importance to have appropriate management and marketing tools for sustainable tourism. This is where ConsultingPress can help you. Feel free to contact our consultants today to learn more about sustainable tourism and it’s impact on cultural heritage and local economy.

item.title: The great value of sustainable tourism development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Importance of Sustainable Tourism Development in Preserving Cultural Heritage and Nature
Why is sustainable tourism so important? It helps preserve cultural heritage and nature. By practicing a sustainable tourism as a company, tourist agency and any other for of tourism entity you help to make only positive impact on environment and society, while in the same time you have many economical advantages.
Tourism is one of the largest and fastest growing industries in the world, which is why sustainable tourism is so important. It helps to conserve cultural heritage and preserve nature in the same time. Every destination has it’s own unique story and practicing sustainable tourism, you give that unique story much more important place in marketing, destination planning and assessment and of course you have long term benefits.
Preserving cultural heritage is very important. By cultural heritage we mean all kinds of human creations across the globe. It means all aspects of human history. By marketing your cultural heritage in appropriate way, you are inviting tourists, that is visitors to visit and explore your destination and society. It gives personal experience and leaves long term impact on both the visitor and local economy.
As the number of tourists rises each year, it is of vital importance to have appropriate management and marketing tools for sustainable tourism. This is where ConsultingPress can help you. Feel free to contact our consultants today to learn more about sustainable tourism and it’s impact on cultural heritage and local economy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: 10 Good Reasons to Visit Croatian Coast This Summer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Amazing Sites on Croatian Coast That Are Worth Visiting

Have you ever been to Croatia? Here are ten good reasons to visit Croatia this summer. Croatia is a small but beautiful country situated in Europe with crystal clear Adriatic sea. It's full of amazing beaches, cultural attractions and amazing sites.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Some of Croatia's best attractions

[/vc_column_text][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Dubrovnik%20Old%20Town.%20Ever%20heard%20of%20Dubrovnik%3F%20You%20know%2C%20that%20place%20on%20the%20coast%20where%20they%20filmed%20the%20Game%20of%20Thrones%3F%20Well%20you%20should.%20It's%20a%20great%20place%20to%20visit%2C%20with%20exquisite%20restaurants%2C%20cultural%20sites%2C%20amazing%20beaches%20and%20of%20course%20Game%20of%20Thrones%20series%20original%20throne%20is%20there%20and%20you%20can%20see%20it%2C%20take%20photos%20and%20make%20remarkable%20memories!%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Split.%20What's%20so%20great%20about%20Split%3F%20Well%20it's%20one%20of%20the%20largest%20cities%20on%20Croatian%20coast%2C%20host%20of%20mega%20popular%20Ultra%20festival%2C%20amazing%20cultural%20heritage%2C%20beaches%2C%20night%20clubs%20and%20bars%2C%20everything%20you%20can%20imagine%20is%20there.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22The%20Sea%20Organ%20of%20Zadar.%20Want%20to%20listen%20beautiful%20sounds%20of%20the%20waves%20and%20sea%3F%20Seriously%20if%20you%20haven't%20been%20to%20Zadar%20to%20hear%20The%20Sea%20Organ%20you%20need%20to!%20It's%20first%20attraction%20in%20the%20world%20of%20that%20kind!%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Opatija.%20One%20of%20the%20most%20beautiful%20and%20popular%20places%20in%20Istria%2C%20with%20exquisite%20cuisine%2C%20beautiful%20hotels%20and%20beaches.%20Also%20one%20of%20the%20most%20popular%20business%20destinations.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22And%20so%20many%20more...%20I%20could%20write%20about%20it%20all%20day%20long...%22%7D%5D" design_param=".vc_custom_1481025883782{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]If these few sounds interesting head over to youtube and see some videos. I think you will be thrilled. Also make sure you see some of the less popular parts of Croatia - Zagorje which is full of amazing medieval castles and exquisite cuisine and rich cultural heritage. Towns that are worth visiting, among other are Trakošćan with amazing castle, Varaždin - small barouque town with beautiful architecture, and of course Zagreb, main capital. Also one great part of Croatia is Slavonija. Beautiful part in East Croatia, characteristic by traditional cuisine and one of the best wine cellars in the world. Also make sure to visit Vinkovci, the oldest town in whole Europe. There is so much to see in that beautiful country. Like "Emilia Clarke" said in her interview about Croatia, what she likes: Food, Culture, People... So make sure to put it in your travel calendar![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
